channel.title: Black Mesa Bug on Steam
channel.description:
while playing black mesa on steam , When i enter into another chapter , it shows another thing instead of chapter name. For chapter blast pit it shows :
[tt]#BMS_Chapter6_Title[/tt]
and when saving game . it shows :
[tt]#BMS_Saved[/tt]
What is the bug ?
Just in case , my black mesa version is not illegal !
